TopicTitle: Vessel Mass Reported Differently in Mechjeb vs Kerbal Engineering System!

Articles.Content:
I noticed a discrepancy between the vehicle mass reported by Mechjeb's Vessel Info window and Kerbal Engineering System:

Mechjeb includes any launchpad clamps you may have added while Kerbal Engineering System does not. I kept wondering why the numbers were different until I ran them through my calculator by hand.

Perhaps the makers of these two awesome mods could collaborate and compare notes on this issue...
Perhaps post in MechJeb's thread to remove launch clamps from the calculation?
